item.coloph: di rnams ji ltar gyur pa'i cho ga rnam par phye ba yin/ /'di ni bstan pa'i nor thams cad pa ste/ paN+Di ta chen po ratna k'i rtis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //paN+Di ta ratna k'i rti dang/ lo tsA ba chings yon tan 'bar gyis bsgyur/

item.tib: khro bo bcu'i gtor ma'i cho ga
item.coloph: rdzogs so// //

item.tib: dbang bskur ba'i rab tu byed pa
item.coloph: dbang bskur ba'i rab tu byed pa ni de ltar bstan pa yin no/ /slob dpon mkhas pa chen po bsod snyoms pa dge slong 'od srungs gzhon nu'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi @286b mkhan po ta thA ga ta rakshi ta dang/ zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba bandhve rin chen bzang pos bsgyur ba'o//

item.tib: sbyor ba yan lag drug pa zhes bya ba'i 'grel pa
item.coloph: dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i sbyor ba yan lag drug pa zhes bya ba'i 'grel pa slob dpon sangs rgyas ye shes zhabs kyi lugs paN+Di ta smri tis mdzad pa rdzogs so//

item.tib: sbyor ba yan lag drug pa zhes bya ba
item.coloph: ye shes zhabs lugs kyi sbyor ba yan lag drug pa zhes bya ba rdzogs so//

item.tib: 'jam pa'i rdo rje mchod pa'i cho ga
item.coloph: 'jam pa'i rdo rje mchod pa'i cho ga slob dpon dpal sbyin gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //shAkya'i dge slong blo gros seng ges zhu chen byas nas paN+Di ta chen po bi bh'u ti tsandras rang 'gyur du mdzad pa'o// //ye dharmA he tu pra bha wA he tunte shAnta thA ga to hya wad ta/ te shAnytsa yo ni ro dha ae wam bA d'i ma hA shra ma na:/ /

item.tib: aragha'i cho ga
item.coloph: aargha'i cho ga snying po bsdus pa zhes bya ba slob dpon snang byed zla bas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dpal ba rendra ba'i zhal snga nas dang/ lo tsA ba dge slong pradznyA k'irtis bsgyur ba'o//

item.tib: rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga
item.coloph: rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga ye shes snang ba zhes bya ba slob dpon snang byed zla bas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dpal ba rendra pa'i zhal snga nas dang/ lo tsA ba dge slong pradznyA k'i rtis bsgyur ba'o//

item.tib: rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga zhes bya ba
item.coloph: paN+Di ta mi 'jigs pa'i phyag gis mdzad pa/ /rab gnas kyi cho ga mdor bsdus pa rdzogs so//

item.tib: rgya che ba'i tshig bsdus pa zhes bya ba rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga
dpal ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'i rgyud las phyung ba spyan ma'i ngan song sbyong ba'i cho ga
item.coloph: shi ba bde 'gror sbyar ba'i cho ga shin tu 'dod pa mchog tu gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ming can dpal stong nyid ting nge 'dzin rdo rje'i zhabs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po aa ba dh'u t'i bee ro tsa na badzra'i zhal snga nas dang/ bod kyi lo tsA ba khams ba ldi ri chos kyi grags pas bsgyur ba'o//

item.tib: tha ma'i mchod pa'i cho ga
item.coloph: tha ma'i cho ga'i ming gi rnam grangs gshin po bde bar gshegs pa'i gnas la 'god pa zhes bya ba paN+Di ta dpal ting nge 'dzin rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dpal phyogs dbang dga' byed kyi zhal snga nas dang/ lo tsA ba dge slong pradznyA k'irtis bsgyur ba'o//

item.tib: rgyud kyi rgyal po dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i rnam par bshad pa
item.coloph: rgyud kyi rgyal po dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i dgongs pa thams cad nye bar len pa'i 'grel ba rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dznyA na garbha dang/ bod kyi lo tsA ba bee ro tsa nas bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa//

item.tib: gsang ba 'dus pa'i rgyud kyi gleng gzhi bla ma'i man ngag gi bshad pa
item.coloph: dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon sgeg pa'i rdo rje mdzad pa rdzogs so//

item.tib: dpal bde ba chen po'i sgrub thabs
item.coloph: rdo rje sems bsgrub phyir bris te/ /rdo rje bzhad pa'i slob dpon gyis/ /sems can ye shes bskyed phyir ro/ /dpal bde ba chen po'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so//

item.tib: dpal bde ba chen po sgrub pa'i thabs rnam par bshad pa
item.coloph: dpal bde ba chen po'i 'grel pa slob dpon chen po bi mA la garbhas mdzad pa rdzogs so//

item.tib: dpal gsang ba 'dus pa lhan cig skyes pa'i sgrub thabs
item.coloph: gsang chen lhan cig skyes pa'i sgrub thabs slob dpon rdo rje sgeg pas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //kha che'i rigs kyi paN+Di ta chen po buddha shrI dznyA na dang/ lo tsA ba byams pa'i dpal gyis bsgyur ba'o// //

item.tib: rgyud kyi rgyal po dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i 'grel pa
item.coloph: rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i 'grel pa bla ma'i man ngag nyid las bris pa dam pa rnams kyi spyi bos blangs pa paN+Di ta chen po smri ti dznyAn k'i rtis mdzad cing paN+Di ta de nyid kyis rang 'gyur du mdzad pa rdzogs so// //

item.tib: lha mo bzhis yongs su zhus pa'i rnam par bshad pa man ngag rgyas pa zhes bya ba
item.coloph: rgya gar gyi mkhan po rdo rje slob dpon smri ti dznyA na k'i rtis mdzad pa lha mo bzhis yongs su zhus pa'i rnam par bshad pa man ngag rgyas pa zhes bya ba rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po rdo rje smri ti dzanyA na k'i rti nyid kyis bsgyur cing zhus te bshad nas gtan la phab pa'o// //

item.tib: lha mo bzhis yongs su zhus pa'i rnam par bshad pa
item.coloph: lha mo bzhis yongs su zhus pa'i rgyud kyi bshad pa slob dpon ye shes snying pos mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dran pa ye shes grags pas bsgyur te gtan la phab pa'o// //

item.tib: dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i dka' 'grel
item.coloph: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs kyi gsang ba 'dus pa zhes bya ba rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po'i dka' 'grel slob dpon kun dga' snying pos mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po bi dza ya shrI bha dra dang/ zhu chen lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur te/ slad nas A tsA rya shraddha ka ra war mas zhus te gtan la phab pa// //

item.tib: dpal gshin rje gshed kyi rgyud kyi dka' 'grel lhan cig skyes pa'i snang ba zhes bya ba
item.coloph: dpal gshin rje gshed nag po'i dka' 'grel lhan cig skyes pa'i snang ba zhes bya ba slob dpon shrI dha ras mdzad pa las rim par phye ba bco brgyad pa'i bshad pa rdzogs so// //paN+Di ta chen po shAnti bha dra dang/ lo tsA ba dge slong tshul khrims rgyal bas bsgyur te zhus nas gtan la phab pa// //

item.tib: dpal gshin rje'i dgra nag po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po'i dka' 'grel rin po che'i sgron ma zhes bya ba
item.coloph: dpal gshin rje'i dgra nag po zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po'i dka' 'grel rin po che'i sgron ma zhes bya ba slob dpon mkhas pa chen po ratnA ka ra shanti sa nyung bar sbyar ba 'di yongs su rdzogs so// //aA ts'arya bi na ya tsandra dang/ /lo tsA ba dge slong chos kyi shes rab kyis dad pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// //

item.tib: gshin rje gshed nag po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po mngon par mthong ba lam gyi sgron ma zhes bya ba'i rgya cher bshad pa
item.coloph: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs gshin rje gshed nag po'i rgyud kyi rgya cher 'grel pa mngon par mthong ba lam gyi sgron ma zhes bya ba/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po chen po krishna pa chen pos mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rnal 'byor pa bsod snyoms pa pradznyA shrI dznyA na k'i rtis rang 'gyur du mdzad pa'o//

item.tib: gshin rje gshed nag po'i rgyud kyi dka' 'grel rin po che'i 'phreng ba zhes bya ba
item.coloph: dpal gshin rje gshed nag po'i dka' 'grel rin po che'i phreng ba zhes bya ba/ slob dpon gzhon nu zla bas mdzad pa rdzogs so//

item.tib: gshin rje'i dgra nag po'i rgyud kyi dka' 'grel
item.coloph: gshin rje nag po'i rnam 'grel ye shes sgron ma zhes bya ba/ slob dpon pad+ma pA nis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi slob dpon par me shva ra dang/ bod kyi lo tsA ba rong zom chos kyi bzang pos bsgyur ba'o// //

item.tib: gshin rje gshed nag po'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba
item.coloph: tshig gi snang ba grub pa zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs/ slob dpon dpal 'dzin gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //paN+Di ta dA na k'i rti dang/ lo tsA ba tshul khrims rgyal ba'i 'gyur// //

item.tib: gshin rje gshed nag po'i dkyil 'khor gyi sgrub thabs
item.coloph: gshin rje gshed nag po'i dkyil 'khor sgrub pa'i thabs/ slob dpon mkhas pa dpal 'dzin gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dA na k'i rti dang/ lo tsA ba dge slong tshul khrims rgyal bas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//

item.tib: rdo rje dbyangs can ma'i bstod pa
item.coloph: rdo rje dbyangs can ma'i bstod pa slob dpon dpal 'dzin gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //paN+Di ta su ma ti k'i rti dang/ lo tsA ba mar do chos kyi dbang phyug gis bsgyur ba'o//

item.tib: gshin rje dgra'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga gshin rje gshed 'byung ba zhes bya ba
item.coloph: gshin rje gshed 'byung ba zhes bya ba/ slob dpon chen po la li ta badzra'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po aa mo gha badzra dang/ bod kyi lo tsA ba cog gru shes rab bla mas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//

item.tib: mchod rten bsgrub pa'i cho ga mdor bsdus pa
item.coloph: rgya gar gyi mkhan po la li ta badzras mdzad pa rdzogs so// //

item.tib: bsrung ba'i 'khor lo sgrub pa'i thabs
item.coloph: dpal mar me mdzad bzang pos mdzad pa rdzogs so//

item.tib: gshin rje gshed nag po zhes bya ba'i sgrub pa'i thabs
item.coloph: zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba 'gos lhas btsas kyis/ /rgya gar gyi dpe phyi mo dang gtugs te gtan la phab pa'o/

item.tib: gshin rje gshed nag po'i sgrub pa'i thabs
item.coloph: gshin rje'i dgra nag po sgrub pa'i thabs slob dpon gho sha badzras mdzad pa rdzogs so// //bal po'i mkhan po su ma ti tsandra'i zhal snga nas dang/ bod kyi lo tsA ba bande tshogs chag chung bas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//

item.tib: dpal gshin rje'i gshed dgra nag po'i sgrub thabs 'khor lo'i don rgyas par bshad pa dang bcas pa
item.coloph: dpal gshin rje'i gshed dgra nag po'i sgrub pa'i thabs 'khor lo'i don rgyas par bshad pa dang bcas pa slob dpon mi bskyod pa'i rdo rje'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa 'di yongs su rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po A ts'arya bi nA ya tsandra dang/ bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong chos kyi shes rab kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//

item.tib: gshin rje'i gshed nag po sgrub pa'i thabs
item.coloph: dpal gshin rje gshed nag po'i rgyud bzhi brgya lnga bcu pa las/ mkhas pa rnams kyis gsol ba btab pas/ dge slong bsod snyoms pa ka ma la ra kshi tra zhes bya bas bsdus pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po paN+Di ta chen po d'i pam ka ra shrI dznyA na dang/ bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong tshul khrims rgyal bas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//

item.tib: maN+Dala gyi cho ga
item.coloph: aom badzra mandala la mu: zhes bya ba ni mandala gnyis gshegs su gsol ba'o/ /yi dam lha'i mandala ni so so'i sgrub thabs kyi gzhung las shes par bya'o/ /slob dpon chen po dpal rnyog med rdo rje'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so// // rgya gar gyi mkhan po aa du la dha sa dang/ lo tsA ba dge slong blo ldan shes rab kyis bsgyur ba'o//

item.tib: maN+Dala gyi cho ga zhes bya ba
item.coloph: dngos kyi mandala rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po ka ma la rakshi tas/ gshin rje gshed kyi rgyud bzhi brgya lnga bcu pa la brten nas mandala gyi cho ga mdzad pa'o// //lo tsA ba shrI pra dznyA na k'i rtis bsgyur pa'o//

item.tib: gshin rje'i dgra nag po'i sgrub pa'i thabs ku mu da kha bye ba zhes bya ba
item.coloph: gshin rje'i dgra nag po'i sgrub pa'i thabs/ /ku mu da kha bye ba zhes bya ba/ slob dpon rin chen 'byung gnas zhi ba'i zhal snga nas kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //aA ts'arya bi na tsandra dang/ lo tsA ba dge slong chos kyi shes rab kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//

item.tib: gshin rje gshed nag po'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba
gshin rje gshed rnam par snang mdzad kyi mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya ba
item.coloph: gshin rje gshed rnam par snang mdzad kyi mngon rtogs zhes bya ba/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po mkhas par grags pa/ dpa' mar me mdzad kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rnal 'byor pa pradznyA shrI dznyA na k'i rtis rang 'gyur du mdzad pa'o//

item.tib: gshin rje gshed rin chen 'byung ldan gyi sgrub thabs zhes bya ba
item.coloph: gshin rje gshed rin chen 'byung ldan gyi sgrub thabs zhes bya ba/ slob dpon chen po dpal mar me mdzad kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rnal 'byor pa pradznyA shrI dznyA na k'i rtis rang 'gyur du mdzad pa'o//

item.tib: 'od dpag tu med pa'i snying po 'dod chags gshin rje gshed sgrub pa'i thabs zhes bya ba
item.coloph: 'od dpag tu med pa'i snying po 'dod chags gshin rje gshed kyi sgrub thabs zhes bya ba/ /slob dpon mar me mdzad kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so//

item.tib: gshin rje gshed rdo rje rnon po zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs
item.coloph: gshin rje gshed rdo rje rnon po zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs/ slob dpon chen po mar me mdzad kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rnal 'byor pa pradznyA shrI dznyA na k'i rtis rang 'gyur du mdzad pa'o//

item.tib: rdo rje sems ma bde ba'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba
item.coloph: rdo rje sems ma bde ba bsgrub pa'i thabs zhes bya ba slob dpon mkhas pa chen po mar me mdzad kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rnal 'byor pa pradznyA shrI dznyA na k'i rtis rang 'gyur du mdzad pa'o//

item.tib: rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma rnal 'byor ma'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba
item.coloph: rdo rje mkha' 'gro rnal 'byor ma'i sgrub thabs slob dpon mar me mdzad kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so//

item.tib: rdo rje bde rgyas dbyangs can ma'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba
item.coloph: rdo rje bde rgyas dbyang can ma'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba rdzogs so//

item.tib: las kyi rdo rje gau r'i'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba
item.coloph: rdo rje goo r'i'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba rdzogs so//

item.tib: rje btsun 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed mchod pa'i cho ga'i rim pa zhes bya ba
item.coloph: rje btsun 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed mchod pa'i cho ga'i rim pa zhes bya ba/ slob dpon chen po krishna paN+Di tas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //

item.tib: sangs rgyas gshin rje gshed nag po'i sgrub pa'i thabs zhes bya ba
item.coloph: sangs rgyas gshen rje gshed nag po'i sgrub thabs/ nA da ku be ra las byung ba'i don/ kun da nakshe ri na bzhugs pa'i mkhas pa chen po rnal 'byor pa nag po zhabs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rnal 'byor pa pradznyA sh'i dznyA na k'irtis rang 'gyur du mdzad pa'o//

item.tib: gshin rje gshed nag po'i sgrub pa'i thabs zhes bya ba
item.coloph: dpal gshin rje gshed nag po sgrub pa'i thabs zhes bya ba/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po chen po ka ma la rakshi tas mdzad pa rdzogs so// // rnal 'byor pa bsod snyoms pa pra dznyA shrI dznyA na k'i rtis rang 'gyur du mdzad pa'o//

item.tib: khro bo tho ba gshin rje gshed kyi sgrub thabs zhes bya ba
item.coloph: khro bo tho ba gshin rje gshed kyis grub thabs zhes bya ba/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po mar me mdzad kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so//

item.tib: dbyug pa gshin rje gshed rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs
item.coloph: dbyug pa gshin rje gshed rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs/ slob dpon chen po d'i pam ka ras mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rnal 'byor pa pradznyA shrI dznyA na k'i rtis rang 'gyur du mdzad pa'o//

item.tib: ral gri gshin rje gshed gtum po'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba
item.coloph: ral gri gshin rje gshed gtum po'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba rdzogs so//

item.tib: pad+ma gshin rje gshed shes rab bde ba can gyi sgrub thabs zhes bya ba
item.coloph: pad+ma gshin rje gshed shes rab bde ba can gyi sgrub thabs zhes bya ba/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po d'i pam ka ra zhes bya bas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rnal 'byor pa pra dznyA shrI dznyA na k'i rtis rang 'gyur du mdzad pa'o//

item.tib: gshin rje gshed nag po'i sgrub thabs kyi maN+Dala gyi cho ga zhes bya ba
item.coloph: gshin rje gshed nag po'i sgrub thabs kyi mandala gyi cho ga zhes bya ba rdzogs so// //zangs gling rnal 'byor nA ga p'u ra yis/ /rnal 'byor ka ma rakshi ta nyid la/ /gu tsha rgyal bu'i bu nyid btang nas kyang/ /ta ru pa ri dur khrod tshal nyid du/ /rnal 'byor 'dus pa'i tshogs kyi 'khor lo nang/ /gsol btab rnal 'byor rnams kyi zhal ngo ru/ /mandala cho ga bsod snyoms pa yis byas/ /deng sang rnal 'byor lta spyod ldan pa yis/ /dus rnams rtag tu mandala 'bad par rigs//

item.tib: chos kyi sku'i snang ba'i cho ga zhes bya ba
item.coloph: rgya gar gyi mkhan po ka lA pa ma hA zhes bya bas mdzad pa mchod rten gyi cho ga rdzogs so// // rnal 'byor bsod snyoms pa pradznyA shrI dznyA nas rang 'gyur du byas pa'o/ /som pu ri'i gtsug lag khang chen du/ /nag po zhabs zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor pas/ /rnal 'byor tshe 'phos de ba pA la yis/ /yab mchog dharma pA la 'das gyur pa'i/ /ched du gsol btab rgyal po'i zhal ngo ru/ /mchod rten cho ga me tog tshal du mdzad/ /spros bcas spros med tshul gyi lam mchog 'di/ /deng sang rnal 'byor rnams kyis gdab par rigs//

item.tib: gshin rje gshed kyi ro bsreg gi cho ga zhes bya ba
item.coloph: gshin rje gshed kyi ro sreg gi cho ga zhes bya ba slob dpon nag po zhabs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so//

item.tib: tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i cho ga zhes bya ba
item.coloph: tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i rim pa slob dpon nag po zhabs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so//

item.tib: gshin rje gshed nag po'i zhi ba'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga
yi dgas thams cad rdo rjes bcings pa
item.coloph: dpal gshin rje gshed nag po'i 'khor lo bri ba'i cho ga rdzogs so//

item.tib: gshin rje gshed nag po'i mngon par rtogs pa'i rim pa
dpal gshin rje gshed nag po'i 'khor lo bri ba'i cho ga
gshin rje dgra nag po zhes bya ba'i sgrub pa'i thabs
gshin rje gshed kyi sgrub pa'i thabs
item.coloph: gshin rje gshed kyi sgrub thabs slob dpon 'gro bzangs snying pos mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po d'i pa ka ra shrI dznyA na dang/ /zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa'o// `/ /

item.tib: nag po zhal gsum phyag drug pa'i sgrub thabs
item.coloph: nag po zhal gsum phyag drug pa'i sgrub thabs/ slob dpon la li ta badzra sa mdzad pa rdzogs so//

item.tib: o ma'i sgrub pa'i thabs
item.coloph: dpal krishna ya mA ri'i rgyud las/ 'o ma sgrub pa'i man ngag tu byas la/ A tsarya dzi mu da bA tA las mdzad pa/ 'o ma sgrub pa'i man ngag rdzogs so// //aA ts'arya badzra pA ni dang/ lo tsA ba dge slong chos kyi shes rab kyis bsgyur ba'o/ `/ /gshin rje gshed nag po'i 'khor lo'i man ngag bzhugs//

item.tib: gshin rje gshed nag po'i 'khor lo'i man ngag
item.coloph: gshed nag 'khor lo'i man ngag /slob dpon chen po nA ga bo dhis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //lo tsA ba dge slong chos rab kyis bsgyur/ `/ /sbyin sreg gi cho ga bzhugs/

item.tib: gshin rje gshed nag po'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga
item.coloph: sbyin sreg gi cho ga slob dpon chen po la li ta badzras mdzad pa rdzogs so//

item.tib: chi bdag yi dwags rgyal po'i sgrub thabs
item.coloph: chi bdag yi dags rgyal po'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so//

item.tib: gshin rje gshed kyi lag pa'i mchod pa
item.coloph: lag pa'i mchod pa dA na sh'i las bsgyur ba rdzogs so//

item.tib: gshin rje gshed nag po'i dkyil 'khor gyi bstod pa zhes bya ba
item.coloph: slob dpon dpal 'dzin gyi dgongs pa nye bar bsdus pa las/ /gshin rje gshed nag po'i dkyil 'khor gyi bstod pa/ A ts'arya k'i rti'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so//

item.tib: rdo rje 'dzin pas gshin rje gshed po la bstod pa'i rgyud
item.coloph: rdo rje 'dzin pas gshin rje gshed po la bstod pa le'u'i rgyud las bstod pa'i le'u'o/ /rdzogs so//

item.tib: dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi rgyud kyi dka' 'grel
item.coloph: dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi rgyud kyi dka' 'grel/ /rdo rje slob dpon mi bskyod pas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po bi nA ya tsandra dang/ lo tsA ba dge slong chos kyi shes rab kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//

item.tib: dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi rgyud kyi mdor bshad pa zhes bya ba
item.coloph: dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi rgyud kyi mdor bshad pa/ slob dpon so na shrIs mdzad pa rdzogs so// //mkhas pa chen po ta thA ga ta'i zhal nas brgyud pa'o/

item.tib: dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed rgyud kyi mdo mdor bshad pa zhes bya ba
item.coloph: dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed rnal 'byor gyi skabs mdo mdor bshad pa rdzogs so// //slob dpon dpal 'dzin gyi rjes su 'brangs ba'i slob dpon dpal chen po rdo rje grub pas mdzad pa rdzogs so/

item.tib: rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi rgyud kyi dka' 'grel
item.coloph: slob dpon mkhas pa chen po dpal gzhon nu zla bas mdzad pa'i dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi rgyud chen po'i dka' 'grel rdzogs so// //paN+Di ta mkhas pa chen po ta thA ga ta rakshi ta dang/ lo tsA ba dge slong ba rin chen grags pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//

item.tib: rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi rgyud kyi 'grel pa rin po che'i phreng ba
ma he'i zhal gyi sgrub pa'i thabs
item.coloph: dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po'i rgyud kyi sgrub thabs slob dpon dpal 'dzin gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po rnam par snang mdzad srung ba'i zhabs dang/ lo tsA ba khams pa dge slong ba ri dharmA k'irtis bsgyur ba'o//

item.tib: rdo rjes 'jigs byed zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs
item.coloph: 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis rab mdzad pa/ /phyag gnyis pa'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po A tsarya aa nanta dang/ bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong rdo rje grags kyis bsgyur ba'o//

item.tib: dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi sgrub pa'i thabs mdor bsdus pa
item.coloph: dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi sgrub pa'i thabs mdor bsdus pa/ slob dpon chen po shrI bha dras mdzad pa rdzogs so// //

item.tib: rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi bsnyen pa'i cho ga
sgrub pa'i cho ga
dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi rtog pa las 'khor lo bskor ba'i las drag po phyogs gcig pa
item.coloph: dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi rtog pa las 'khor lo bskor ba'i las drag po phyogs gcig pa/ slob dpon zhi ba'i ye shes kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so//

item.tib: rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi sgrub thabs
item.coloph: slob dpon manydzu shrI dznyA nas mdzad pa/ zhang 'or ston pa shes rab bsod nams kyis bsgyur ba rdzogs so//

item.tib: dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed sgrub pa'i thabs las bya ba'i cho ga sems dpa' bsdus pa
item.coloph: dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi sgrub thabs/ A tsA rya don yod rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs// //nyid kyi rang 'gyur ro/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po manydzu shrI dznyA na dang/ bod kyi lo tsA ba rong zom chos kyi bzang pos bsgyur cing/ slar yang phyug mtshams dbang phyug rgyal pos bsgyur cing gtan la yang dag par phab pa'o//

item.tib: dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga
item.coloph: dpal 'jam pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga slob dpon chen po dpal don yod pa'i zhabs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //paN+Di ta de nyid dang/ lo tsA ba rdo rje grags kyis bsgyur ba'o//

item.tib: dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po'i gsad pa'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba
dpal de kho na nyid grub pa
item.coloph: slob dpon chen po ke ra li pas mdzad pa de kho na nyid grub pa rdzogs so//

item.tib: dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi dam tshig la 'jug pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga
item.coloph: dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi dam tshig sgrub par byed pa'i cho ga /dngos grub mnyes pa'i slob dpon chen po dpal la li ta badzra'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //grub pa brnyes pa'i paN+Di ta chen po aa mo gha badzra dang/ / lo tsA ba mar pa dge bsnyen chos 'bar gyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//

item.tib: rdo rje'i tshig rnam par dbye ba
rdo rje tsar tsi ka'i las sgrub pa'i thabs
item.coloph: rdo rje tsandi ka'i las sgrub pa'i thabs @185b slob dpon chen po bram ze dpal 'dzin gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi paN+Di ta rgyal sras bi bh'u ti tsandi'i zhal snga nas/ glo bo lo tsA ba dge slong shes rab rin chen gyis chos kyi rgyal po'i pho brang sku mkhar nyi gzungs su bsgyur ba'o//

item.tib: rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi sgrub thabs
dpar rdo rje phag mo'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba
item.coloph: rdo rje phag mo'i sgrub thabs grub thob kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i slob dpon dpal 'dzin gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi paN+Di ta chen po rgyal ba'i sras bi bh'u ti tsandra'i zhal snga nas/ dpal chos kyi dbyings kyi gtsug lag khang rang byung du mdzad pa las glo bo lo tsA ba dge slong shes rab rin chen gyis zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//

item.tib: dpal rdo rje dbyangs can ma'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba
item.coloph: dpal rdo rje dbyangs can ma'i sgrub thabs/ grub thob kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i slob dpon dpal 'dzin gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi paN+Di ta chen po rgyal ba'i sras dpal bi bh'u ti tsandra dang/ glo bo lo tsA ba dge slong shes rab rin chen gyis chos kyi rgyal po'i pho brang sku mkhar nyi gzungs su bsgyur te gtan la phab pa'o//

item.tib: rdo rje dkar mo'i rjes su 'dzin pa'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba
item.coloph: dpal rdo rje dkar mo'i sgrub thabs/ grub thob kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i slob dpon dpal 'dzin gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// /rgya gar gyi paN+Di ta rgyal sras dpal bi bh'u ti tsandra dang/ glo bo lo tsA ba dge slong shes rab rin chen gyis chos kyi rgyal po'i khab sku mkhar nyid gzungs su bsgyur cing zhus te gtan phab pa'o// //

item.tib: las kyi gshin rje 'khor bcas kyi mchod pa'i cho ga
item.coloph: rgya gar shar phyogs kyi paN+Di ta darpan A tsaryas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //paN+Di ta de nyid dang/ lo tsA ba zhe sdang rdo rjes dag par bsgyur ba'o//

item.tib: dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi sgrub pa'i thabs zhes bya ba
item.coloph: dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed ma he'i gdong can dpa' bo gcig pa'i sgrub thabs/ slob dpon manydzu badzras mdzad pa rdzogs so// //bal po'i paN+Di ta bha ro phyag rdum dang/ bod kyi lo tsA ba rdo rje grags kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//

item.tib: rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi tshogs kyi 'khor lo zhes bya ba
item.coloph: dpal ldan rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi tshogs kyi 'khor lo/ slob dpon ratna A ka ra shAntis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po 'di pam ka ra rakshi ta dang/ lo tsA ba dge slong rdo rje grags kyis bsgyur ba'o//

item.tib: tstshu tstshunda ra'i rtog pa
item.coloph: tstshu tstshunda ra'i rtog pa rdzogs so// //bha ro phyag rdum gyi phyag dpe las/ rva rdo rje grags kyis phyis bsgyur ba'o//

item.tib: rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga zhes bya ba
item.coloph: dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi drag po'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga aa mo gha badzra sa mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rva rdo rje grags kyis bsgyur ba'o//

item.tib: dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi sgrub thabs
item.coloph: dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi sgrub pa'i thabs slob dpon la li ta badzra'i zhabs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po pradznyA shrI de ba dang/ bod kyi lo tsA ba cog gru bande shes rab bla mas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// //

item.tib: dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi sgrub thabs
item.coloph: dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi sgrub thabs rdzogs so// //grub pa'i slob dpon la li tas mdzad pa'o// //

item.tib: dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi gtor ma'i cho ga
item.coloph: slob dpon chen po la li ta badzras mdzad pa rdzogs so//

item.tib: bhee ra ba'i zhi ba'i bya ba bdun pa
drag po'i las kyi bya ba bdun pa
las kyi grogs kyis byed pa
dam rdzas rmad du bsgyur te bsten pa'i cho ga
gtam rgyud kyi rtog pa
item.coloph: gtam rgyud kyi rtogs pa rdzogs so//

item.tib: dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi phyag mtshan gyi rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba
item.coloph: mkhas pa chen po ta thA ga ta rakshi tas mdzad pa'o/ /au to bo pa ti dang/ bod kyi lo tsA ba mal gyo blo gros kyis bsgyur ba rdzogs so// //

item.tib: dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po'i sgrub thabs
item.coloph: slob dpon dznyA nA kA ras mdzad pa rdzogs so//

item.tib: de nyid lnga pa'i bstod pa
dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi bstod pa
dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi bstod pa
item.coloph: dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi bstod pa paN+Di ta don yod rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so// //paN+Di ta de nyid dang/ zhang lo tsA ba shes rab bla mas bsgyur ba'o//

item.tib: 'jam dpal 'jigs byed mtshan gyi bstod pa
dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi sgrub pa'i thabs rdo rje 'od ces bya ba
dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga gsal ba zhes bya ba
dpal gshin rje gshed po'i rtsa ba'i sngags don rdo rje rab tu 'byed pa zhes bya ba
item.coloph: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtog pa thams cad bsdus par gyur pa/ rdo rje rab tu 'byed pa zhes bya ba'i cho ga zhib mo las/ slob dpon dpal ldan sgeg pa'i rdo rjes/ las dang dngos grub kyi cho ga zhib mo slob dpon rigs pa bzang pos de la phan pa'i le'u gcig mdzad pa dang bcas pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dpal au pA ya shrI mi tra dang/ rong zom chos kyi bzang pos bsgyur te gtan la phab pa// //

item.tib: gshin rje gshed nag po gdong drug pa'i 'khor lo'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba
item.coloph: dpal gshin rje gshed nag po gdong drug pa'i 'khor lo'i sgrub thabs mdor bsdus la/ slo dpon de ba A ka ra tsandras mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po de ba A ka ra tsandra de nyid dang/ cog ro bande shes rab bla mas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//

item.tib: gshin rje'i dgra bsgrub pa'i 'khor lo'i sgrub thabs
item.coloph: dpal au rgyan gyi yul nas byung ba grub pa'i 'khor lo ji ltar rnyed pa klu'i byang chub kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so//

item.tib: gshin rje mthar byed dmar po'i sgrub thabs
item.coloph: gshin rje mthar byed dmar po'i sgrub thabs rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug bi r'u pas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po bla ma rje btsun chen po nyi ma'i dbang po'i 'od zer gyi zhal snga nas/ chag lo tsA ba dge slong chos rje dpal gyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// //

item.tib: gshin rje gshed dmar po'i sgrub thabs
item.coloph: gshin rje gshed dmar po'i sgrub pa'i thabs slob dpon shrI bi r'u pas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar shar phyogs kyi paN+Di ta dA na sh'i las rang 'gyur du mdzad pa'o//

item.tib: 'od gsal 'char ba'i rim pa
item.coloph: dpal gshin rje gshed dmar po'i byin gyis brlab pa'i man ngag 'od gsal 'char ba'i rim pa slob dpon mthu stobs kyi mgon po dpal bi r'u pas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi paN+Di ta ba rendra ba'i zhal snga nas dang/ chag lo tsA dge slong chos rje dpal bzang pos bsgyur ba'o// //

item.tib: shin tu spros pa med pa de kho na nyid kyi man ngag ces bya ba
item.coloph: shin tu spros pa med pa'i de kho na nyid gyi man ngag ces bya ba/ slob dpon dpal ldan mthu stobs kyi mgon po thugs spros pa med pa'i dbyings las ma g.yos bzhin du/ sku'i spros pa dpag tu med pas gdug pa can tshar gcod cing/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dngos su byin gyis brlabs pa'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po bi r'u pas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /bstan pa srung ba'i lha rnams kyis bu gcig pa ltar bskyangs pas rgyal po gzhan gyi rgol bas glags lta bar mi nus pa'i ljongs chos kyi rgyal po'i sku mkhar nyi ma gzugs su rgya gar gyi mkhan po paN+Dita dngos grub brnyes pa dpal drban A ts'arya dang/ glo bo lo tsA ba dge slong shes rab rin chen gyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//

item.tib: gshin rje gshed dmar po'i sgrub thabs kyi cho ga
item.coloph: dpal dpa' bo'i rgyal pos mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po bla ma rje btsun nyi ma'i dbang po'i 'od zer gyi zhal snga nas dang/ chag lo tsA @85a */ /ba dge slong chos rje dpal gyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// //

item.tib: gshin rje gshed kyi 'phrul 'khor gyi phreng ba
item.coloph: dpal au rgyan nas 'byung ba gshin rje gshed dmar po'i rgyud chen 'bum phrag gsum pa las byung ba slob dpon bi r'u pas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar shar phyogs kyi paN+Di ta dpal mkhas pa chen po dA na sh'i la/ yul dbus kyi grub pa thob pa'i gnas drang srong srin po rir bsgyur ba'o// //

item.tib: dpal gshin rje gshed dmar po'i sgrub thabs
item.coloph: dpal ldan gshin rje gshed dmar bde ba'i rang bzhin srid bral sgrub thabs skye bo kun phyir byas/ /bdag gi bsod nams gang thob des 'dir de yi go 'phang 'jig rten don kun grub par shog /dpal gshin rje gshed dmar po'i sgrub thabs/ paN+Di ta chen po rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug phyag rgya chen po grub pa/ grub thob kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i slob dpon dal 'dzin gyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //paN+Di ta slob dpon chen po rje btsun nyid ma'i dbang po'i 'od zer gyi zhal snga nas dang/ /lo tsA ba chag dge song chos rje dpal gyis gus pas mnyan nas/ /mang yul gyi bzo gnas chen por bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// //

item.tib: dpal gshin rje gshed dmar po'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga
item.coloph: dpal gshin rje gshed dmar po'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga paN+Di ta chen po rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dpal 'dzin gyi zhal snga nas mdzad ba rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po paN+Di ta rje btsun chen po dpal gshin rje gshed kyis rjes su gzung ba/ nyi ma'i dbang po'i 'od zer gyi zhal snga nas/ chag lo tsA ba dge slong chos rje dpal gyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// //

item.tib: rnal 'byor bzhi'i de kho na nyid ces bya ba rang byin gyis brlab pa'i man ngag
item.coloph: rnal 'byor bzhi'i de kho na nyid ces bya ba rang byin gyis brlab pa'i man ngag grub thob kyis 'khor los sgyur ba mthu stobs las mnga' brnyes pa/ dpal ldan rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug bram ze dpal 'dzin gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //da ra pan A ts'arya dang/ glo bo lo tsA bas bsgyur ba'o// //

item.tib: gshin rje gshed dmar po'i sgrub thabs
item.coloph: gshin rje gshed dmar po'i sgrub thabs/ slob dpon chen po dpal 'dzin gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //lha'i skad la legs par zhugs pa'i shAkya'i dge slong nyi ma rgyal mtshan dpal bzang pos skad gnyis smra ba rnams kyi gdan sa dpal thar pa gling gi gtsug lag khang du bsgyur ba'o//

item.tib: gshin rje gshed dmar po maN+Dala du mchod pa'i cho ga zhes bya ba
item.coloph: gshin rje gshed dmar po mandala du mchod pa'i cho ga zhes bya ba/ dpal 'dzin gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //lha'i skad la legs par zhugs pa'i shAkya'i dge slong nyis smra ba rnams kyi gdan sa dpal thar pa gling gi gtsug lag khang du bsgyur ba'o//

item.tib: gshin rje gshed nag po dang gshin rje gshed dmar po'i mchod pa'i cho ga
item.coloph: gshin rje gshed nag po dang gshin rje gshed dmar po'i mchod pa'i cho ga /slob dpon chen po paN+Di ta/ dpal 'dzin gyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //paN+Di ta nyi ma'i dbang po'i 'od zer dang/ chag chos rje dpal gyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//

item.tib: gshin rje gshed dmar po'i ting nge 'dzin gyi cho ga
item.coloph: gshin rje gshed dmar po'i ting nge 'dzin gyi cho ga slob dpon dpal 'dzin gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar shar phyogs kyi paN+Di ta chen po dA na sh'i las rang 'gyur du mdzad pa'o//

item.tib: gshin rje gshed dmar po'i gtor ma'i cho ga
item.coloph: gtor ma'i cho ga slob dpon dpal 'dzin gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po bla ma rdo rje btsun chen po nyi ma'i dbang po'i 'od zer dang chag lo tsA ba dge slong chos kyi dpal gyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//

item.tib: gshin rje gshed dmar po'i sgrub thabs
item.coloph: gshin rje gshed dmar po'i sgrub thabs dpal rnam par snang mdzad srung bas mdzad pa rdzogs so// // rgya gar gyi mkhan po bla ma rje btsun chen po nyi ma'i dbang po'i 'od zer gyi zhal snga nas tshag lo tsA ba dge slong chos rje dpal gyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//

item.tib: rang byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa'i man ngag dang bcas pa gshin rje mthar byed dmar po'i mngon par rtogs pa
item.coloph: rang byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa man ngag dang bcas pa gshin rje gshed dmar po'i mngon par rtogs pa rdzogs so// //slob dpon chen po mkhas shing dngos grub brnyes pa blo gros bzang pos mdzad pa/ /paN+Di ta chen po bla ma rje btsun nyi ma'i dbang po'i 'od zer gyi zhal snga nas gus pas mnyan nas chag lo tsA ba dge slong chos rje dpal gyis ba sgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//

item.tib: gshin rje gshed dmar po'i 'khrul 'khor gyi gsal byed
item.coloph: khor lo'i cho ga nye bar bsdus pa rdzogs so// //panti ta rdo rje gdan pa ni ska lam ka'i zhal snga nas/ dpyal lo tsA ba dpal chos kyi bzang pos bsgyur ba'o//

item.tib: gshin rje dashed dmar po'i 'khor lo'i de kho na nyid kyi gsal byed
item.coloph: dpal gshin rje gshed kyi las tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i de kho na nyid gsal bar byed pa zhes bya ba sgrub pa'i thabs rdzogs so// //paN+Di ta rdo rje gdan pa ni ska lam ka'i zhal snga nas/ dpyal lo tsA ba dpal chos kyi bzang pos bsgyur ba'o//

item.tib: gshin rje dgra dmar po'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba
item.coloph: gshin rje gshed dmar po yon tan 'byung gnas sgrub thabs chos/ /rgya gar dpe 'di bod kyis mi rtogs pas/ /dam pa se tsa'i rig 'dzin skang gnyis pa/ /chos kyi bzang po'i dpe las gus par bsgyur/ /sa'i steng na nyi zla ltar gyur cig/

item.tib: gshin rje gshed dmar po'i rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor zhes bya ba
item.coloph: gshin rje gshed dmar po'i rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor zhes bya ba/ mkhas pa chen po 'jigs med 'byung gnas sbas pas mdzad pa rdzogs so//

item.tib: dpal gshin rje gshed dmar po'i 'tsho ba'i de kho na nyid ces bya ba'i man ngag
item.coloph: dpal gshin rje gshed kyi 'tsho ba'i de kho na nyid ces bya ba/ rgya gar gyi paN+Di ta darpa na A ts'arya'i zhabs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// // rgya gar gyis ndi ta dngos grub brnyes pa darpana A ts'arya de nyid dang/ glo bo lo tsA ba dge slong shes rab rin chen gyis/ chos kyi rgyal po'i sku mkhar nyi zungs su bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//

item.tib: gshin rje mthar byed dmar po'i byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa
item.coloph: gshin rje mthar byed dmar po'i byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa grub thob kyi 'khor los sgyur ba bram bde pa la 'dzin gyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po darbana A ts'arya dang/ glo bo lo tsA ba dge slong shes rab rin chen gyis bsgyur ba'o//

item.tib: lha mo 'od 'dzin ma'i byin gyis brlab pa
item.coloph: ting nge 'dzin gyi bcud len gyi byin rlabs grub thob kyi bdag po mkhas pa chen po dpal 'dzin gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po de ba A ka ra dang/ lo tsA ba rin chen bzang pos bsgyur ba las/ dus phyis rgya gar shar phyogs kyi paN+Di ta darba na A ts'arya dang lo tsA ba dge slong rdo rje 'dzin pa zhe sdang rdo rjes bsgyur cing zhus te slar dag par byas so/ /snga 'gyur la 'di bas tshan che tsam gda'o gsung ngo//

item.tib: 'od 'chang ma'i sgrub pa'i thabs
item.coloph: 'od 'chang ma'i sgrub thabs ting nge 'dzin gyi bcud len gyi man ngag ting nge 'dzin la mnga' brnyes pa dpal 'dzin gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //lo pan snga ma dang 'dra/ 'di'i man ngag gcig sngar yang snyan brgyud du byung 'dug ste/ gzhung sngar ma 'gyur gsung//

item.tib: rang gi sems gong du 'pho ba'i man ngag byin rlabs dang bcas pa
item.coloph: rang gi sems gong du 'pho ba'i man ngag slob dpon dpal 'dzin gyi gdams pa de nyid kyis mdzad pa'o/ /panti ta rgya gar mngon shes can dang/ bod kyi lo tsA ba 'gos khug pas bsgyur ba las/ /phyis sa'i steng na 'gran zla dang bral ba darban a'ats'arya dang/ lo tsA ba shes rab rin chen gyis grong du bsgyur cing zhus pa'o//

item.tib: byin gyis rlabs pa'i rim pa
item.coloph: pho ba'i byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa bcom ldan 'das kyis dngos su byin gyis brlabs pa dpal 'dzin chen pos mdzad pa rdzogs so// //bla ma shar phyogs pa chen po darban A ts'arya dang/ glo bo lo tsA ba dge slong pradznyA ratna sa sku mkhar nyi zungs su bsgyur ba'o// //

item.tib: me'i lha mchod pa zhes bya ba
item.coloph: dpal gshin rje gshed dmar po'i sreg byed me'i cho ga zhes bya ba dngos grub brnyes pa dpal 'dzin gyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po darpan A ts'arya dang/ dge slong shes rab rgyal mtshan gyis mang yul du bsgyur cing zhus pa'o// //

item.tib: bdud rtsi byin gyis brlab pa zhes bya ba
item.coloph: dud rtsi lnga yi byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dpal bi r'u pas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po darban A ts'arya dang/ lo tsA ba zhe sdang rdo rjes mang yul gyi gtsug lag chen por zhugs shing bsgyur ba'o// //

item.tib: bsrung ba'i 'khor lo'i byin brlabs dang phyir bzlog pa'i man ngag ces bya ba
item.coloph: phyir bzlog man ngag gsang ba @146b las kyang ches gsang pa/ bcom ldan 'das gshin rje gshed dmar po'i zhal gyi gdams pa rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dngos grub mchog brnyes pa'i dpal 'dzin gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po aa nu pa mar kshi ta dang/ lo tsA ba dar ma yon tan gyis bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa/ dus phyis chos kyi rgyal po'i sku mkhar gnyis su rgyar gar shar phyogs kyi mkhas pa chen po drpan A ts'ar+ya dang/ lo tsA ba glo bo shes rab rin chen gyis bsgyur cing zhus so/ /'di'i dpe skabs su rgya gar bal po thams cad du rgyun chad pa las phyis au rgyan du mkha' 'gro ma rgya mtsho'i gos can las rnal 'byor senta wa lentas zhus te byung ngo//

item.tib: gshin rje gshed dmar po'i sngags btu ba zhes bya ba
item.coloph: 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed dmar po'i sngags btu ba slob dpon dpal 'dzin zhabs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //paN+Di ta dA na sh'i la dang/ bod kyi lo tsA ba bsod nams seng ges bsgyur ba'o//

item.tib: gshin rje gshed dmar po'i las kyi phreng ba'i sgrub thabs yid bzhin nor bu zhes bya ba
item.coloph: longs spyod can ma'i rtog pa rdzogs so//

item.tib: rin chen phreng ba ma
item.coloph: aa pa tsha ri'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so//

item.tib: klu mo'i sgrub thabs
item.coloph: klu mo zhal mtha' yas ma'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so//

item.tib: klu mo nor skyong zhal ma zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs
item.coloph: nor skyong ma'i sa ma pa th'a//

item.tib: klu mo a phu zhes bya ba'i man ngag
item.coloph: klu mo'i sgrub thabs kyi man ngag cung zad bstan pa rdzogs so//

item.tib: dga' bas tshim ma'i sgrub pa'i thabs zhes bya ba
item.coloph: dga' bas tshim ma zhes bya ba'i rtog pa rdzogs so//

item.tib: gnod sbyin na Da pho mo'i sgrub thabs
item.coloph: gnod spyin na da pho mo'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so// //

item.tib: gnod sbyin mo sa'i bdag mo bkra shis ma'i sgrub thabs
item.coloph: gnod spyin la sogs pa'i sgrub thabs kyi man ngag rdzogs so// //

item.tib: gnod sbyin dga' byed kyi sgrub thabs
item.coloph: gzhan yang las thams cad byed par 'gyur ba'i dga' byed ces bya ba'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so//

item.tib: gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po phur bus 'debs pa'i sgrub thabs
item.coloph: k'i li k'i la zhes bya ba'i gnod spyin gyi rgyal po'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so//

item.tib: brdeg par byed pa'i gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon gyi sgrub thabs
item.coloph: di rdeg par byed pa'i gnod spyin gyi sde dpon zhes bya ba'i rtog pa rdzogs so/ /de bzhin du gzhan yang gnod spyin rnams bsgrub par bya'o/ /gnod spyin gyi sgrub thabs kyi man ngag cung zad bstan pa rdzogs so//

item.tib: dpal zla ba'i lha mo zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs
item.coloph: zla ba'i lha mo zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so// //

item.tib: phrog ma rna cha 'dzin ma'i sgrub thabs
item.coloph: rna cha 'dzin pa'i aa pa tsha ri'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so//

item.tib: yid 'phrog ma'i sgrub thabs
item.coloph: yid 'phrog ma'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so//

item.tib: legs par dga' ma'i sgrub thabs
item.coloph: legs par dga' ma'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so//

item.tib: spyan yangs ma'i sgrub thabs
item.coloph: spyan yangs ma'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so//

item.tib: dod chags dga' ma'i sgrub thabs
item.coloph: dod chags dga' ma'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so//

item.tib: gzhan gyis mi thub ma zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs
item.coloph: byung po aa pa rA dzi ta'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so// //

item.tib: lhag par rgyal ba mi pham ma'i sgrub thabs
item.coloph: mi pham pa'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so//

item.tib: gang ba bzang po'i sgrub thabs
byung mo mdzes ma'i sgrub thabs
item.coloph: byung mo chen mo dpal mdzes ma zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so// //

item.tib: dpal rgyal ba'i mdzes ma'i sgrub thabs
item.coloph: dpal rgyal ba'i mdzes ma zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so//

item.tib: dri med mdzes ma'i sgrub thabs
item.coloph: dri med mdzes ma zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so//

item.tib: sha za pi lu'i pa li sgrub thabs
item.coloph: pi lu pa zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so//
